dailyPenalty.remark: Oh well, tomorrow is another day! Since you did not stay in budget you get:
dailyPenalty.title: ants
dailyPenalty.action: Ewww! Ants have infested your garden

dailyPenalty.remark: Oh no you'll have to do better next time! Since you did not stay in budget today you get:
dailyPenalty.title: caterpillars
dailyPenalty.action: Caterpillars will eat your plants, hurry up and get rid of them!

dailyPenalty.remark: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow! Since you did not stay in budget you get:

dailyPenalty.name: The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails. Since you did not stay in budget you get:
dailyPenalty.title: fungus
dailyPenalty.action: Oh my your plants are sprouting mushrooms! Hurry up and get rid of them
